subtitle.init: What do you want to do?
subtitle.select: Select the firmware that matches your Attractap
subtitle.flash: This process can take several minutes. Please wait until the process is complete.
subtitle.configure: Configure your Attractap so that it can connect to a network and the Attraccess-Server.

init.description: If you have a completely new Attractap, select "Install firmware" to install the latest firmware on your Attractap. If you have an already configured Attractap, select "Configure" to configure your Attractap.

connect.description: Please connect your Attractap to the USB port of your computer and click "Connect", in the following dialog you need to select the correct serial port.
